title: Live Cricket Score, India vs South Africa, 3rd ODI, Rajkot
text: Live Cricket Score, India vs South Africa, 3rd ODI, Rajkot Sunday, 18 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) Catch the live score of India vs South Africa here. Ind vs SL scorecard: India take on South Africa in the third ODI in Rajkot. Reservation protests to hit India-South Africa cricket match 00:31 Ahmedabad, Oct 10 (ANI): Twenty two-year-old caste crusader, Hardik Patel on Saturday announced his Patel community's plans to hold protests during the one-day cricket match between India and South Africa in his home state of Gujarat, demanding reservation in government jobs and educational...
